title: Electric mobility right step in right direction: M&M's Rajesh Jejurikar
description: Mahindra & Mahindra endorsed electric mobility, deeming it essential for Indiaâ€™s progress. The firm's CEO, Rajesh Jejurikar, emphasized the national priority of EVs, responding to opposition against Uttar Pradesh's tax waiver for hybrid vehicles. Hybrid manufacturers demanded tax parity with electric cars given the significant tax difference between the two.
